titleStmt.title: A most horrible, terrible, tollerable, termagant satyre most fresh and newly made, and prest in print, and if it bee not lik'd, the Divells in't.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title, A4r; only known copy lacks all before A3.
Caption title, A3r: To his friend Iohn Taylor, the ingenious poeta aquaticus, and the author of this most wholesome following black-mouth'd biting satire.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
